WITH LOADWIKI AS ( SELECT WIKI.WIKI_SID, WIKI.PARENT_WIKI,WIKI.WIKI_TITLE, WIKI.PROJ_NO, WIKI.MEM_NO, WIKI.WIKI_NO, WIKI.WIKI_CONT, WIKI.WIKI_WRITE_DATE, WIKI_WRI_NICK.PROJ_USER_NICK, CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF AS CBI, CONNECT_BY_ROOT WIKI_SID AS CBR FROM WIKI WIKI LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER WIKI_WRI_MEM ON(WIKI_WRI_MEM.MEM_NO = WIKI.MEM_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN PROJ_MEM WIKI_WRI_NICK ON(WIKI_WRI_NICK.MEM_NO = WIKI_WRI_MEM.MEM_NO AND WIKI_WRI_NICK.PROJ_NO = WIKI.PROJ_NO) START WITH PARENT_WIKI IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR WIKI_SID = PARENT_WIKI ORDER SIBLINGS BY WIKI_SID DESC ) SELECT MAX(WIKI_SID) KEEP(DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY WIKI_WRITE_DATE DESC) AS WIKI_SID, PARENT_WIKI, PROJ_NO, MEM_NO, WIKI_NO,WIKI_TITLE, WIKI_CONT, WIKI_WRITE_DATE, PROJ_USER_NICK FROM LOADWIKI
GROUP BY CBR, PARENT_WIKI, MEM_NO, PROJ_NO, WIKI_NO,WIKI_TITLE, WIKI_CONT, WIKI_WRITE_DATE, PROJ_USER_NICK

SELECT WIKI.WIKI_SID, WIKI.PARENT_WIKI, WIKI.WIKI_TITLE, WIKI.MEM_NO, WIKI.PROJ_NO, WIKI.WIKI_NO, WIKI.WIKI_CONT, WIKI.WIKI_WRITE_DATE, WIKI_WRI_NICK.PROJ_USER_NICK FROM WIKI WIKI LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER WIKI_WRI_MEM ON(WIKI_WRI_MEM.MEM_NO = WIKI.MEM_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN PROJ_MEM WIKI_WRI_NICK ON(WIKI_WRI_NICK.MEM_NO = WIKI_WRI_MEM.MEM_NO AND WIKI_WRI_NICK.PROJ_NO = WIKI.PROJ_NO) WHERE WIKI.PROJ_NO = #{proj_no} AND WIKI.WIKI_NO = #{wiki_no}
